Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Madison/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt EB buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Pulaski, Cermak and California  due to, street blocakge near Madison/Pulaski

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt Eastbound buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Pulaski, Cermak and California, due to, street blocakge near Madison/Pulaski.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
